description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the value of 'zxr10MplsLdpSesState'
enters the 'operational(5) state.

event.Summary: LDP session entered the operational state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSesUp ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtrid s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSessState i 1 ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpOutIfName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtridAddrType i 0

description: The router id of the sending router.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtrid

description: Indicates the status of the session.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSessState

description: The name of the interface.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpOutIfName

description: The name of the VPN instance.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName

description: The Internet address type of the router id .
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtridAddrType

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the value of 'zxr10MplsLdpSesState'
leaves the 'operational(5) state. The value of zxr10LdpSesDownIf is
one of the neighbor's interface. It is the interface associated with
the last neighbor when zxr10LdpSesDownReason is allAdjacenciesDown (3).

event.Summary: LDP session is down due to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSesDown ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtrid s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSessState i 1 ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSesDownReason i 0 ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpOutIfName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtridAddrType i 0

description: The router id of the sending router.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtrid

description: Indicates the status of the session.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSessState

description: The reason why the session transitioned to nonexistent state.
Can be one of the following:
unknown reason, hold time expired, connection time expired,
all adjacencies down, received bad tlv, received bad pdu,
connection error, connection reset, received notification from peer,
received unexpected end-of-file, clear mpls ldp,
error during initialization, graceful restart was aborted or client
command.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpSesDownReason

description: The name of the interface.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpOutIfName

description: The name of the VPN instance.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName

description: The Internet address type of the router id .
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpRtridAddrType

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when an LSP comes up.

event.Summary: LSP is up for VPN instance $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspUp ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFec s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFecLen u 0 ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFecAddrType i 0

description: The LSP FEC in IP address format.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFec

description: The length in bits of the LSP FEC prefix.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFecLen

description: The name of the VPN instance.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName

description: The Internet address type of the LSP FEC .
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFecAddrType

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the LSP goes down.

event.Summary: LSP is down for VPN instance $v4 due to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspDown ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFec s EXAMPLE ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFecLen u 0 ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspDownReason i 0 ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The LSP FEC in IP address format.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFec

description: The length in bits of the LSP FEC prefix.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspFecLen

description: The reason why the LSP went down. Can be one of the following:
the topology changed, the neighbor withdrew the label,
the neighbor went down, the filter changed, the BFD session
went down or the reason is unknown.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpLspDownReason

description: The name of the VPN instance.
variables.name: ZXR10-MPLS-LDP-MIB::zxr10LdpInstanceName

description: An mplsLspPathUp trap signifies that the specified path mplsPathName
for the specified LSP mplsLspName came up.

description: An mplsLspChange trap signifies that the specified LSP has switched traffic
to the new active path 'toLspPath'. The LSP maintains up state before and
after the switch over.
